data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xie, Yanlan, Mound, Laurence A., Zhang, Hongrui (2019): A new species of Heliothrips (Thysanoptera, Panchaetothripinae), based on morphological and molecular data. Zootaxa 4638 (1): 143-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4638.1.8|4 occurrences
